Package DAO

Class AppointmentsDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.AppointmentsDAO
  • public class AppointmentsDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    The class involving database operations on appointments, following the DAO pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()

        This method is used to retrieve a list of all appointments. It joins two tables and loops through the result set to create the appointment objects, then adds the appointments to a list.

        Returns:
        Returns an observable list of all appointments that exist in the database.

      • hasOverlapAppts

        public static boolean hasOverlapAppts​(int selectedCustomerID,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime newStart,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime newEnd)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException

        This method checks whether the appointment times to be entered overlap with any existing appointments. It creates a list of appointments based on the customer selected. Then the new start/end appointments times are checked against every appointment in that list. The boolean true is returned if any conflicting appointments exist.

        Parameters:
        selectedCustomerID - The customer ID to check for overlapping appointments
        newStart - The new start local date/time to be added
        newEnd - The new end local date/time to be added
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean based on whether the new appointment has any overlapping appointments
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if there is a database access error

      • getUserAppts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getUserAppts​(int currentUserID)

        This method retrieves a list of existing appointments associated with a user.

        Parameters:
        currentUserID - The user ID of the current user (user logged into the application)
        Returns:
        A list of appointments associated with the user
